title: O BLESSED ARE THOSE WHO FEAR THE LORD

sections.title: Verse 1
content: O blessed are those who fear the Lord,
You shall eat the fruit of your hands;
Blessed shall you be, and prosper always!

sections.title: Verse 2
content: Your wife will be like a fruitful vine

sections.title: Verse 3
content: Behold, thus shall the man be blessed
The Lord will bless you from Zion;
May you see the prosperity of Jerusalem
All the days of your life!
